[ Package Index | Mudlib Index | Effect Index ]

File /std/basic/scroll_book_react.c

This is the reaction handling code for both spell books and scrolls.

Includes

This class includes the following files /include/tasks.h

Method index

check_react(object)
This method checks to see if the spell reacts with anything.
destroy_this_scroll()
This method is called to destroy the scroll.

Public Functions

These are functions that everyone can access.

.
check_react
void check_react(object player)
This method checks to see if the spell reacts with anything.

Parameters:
paper - who to check (us hopefull)
destroy_this_scroll
void destroy_this_scroll()
This method is called to destroy the scroll. This must be overridden at a higher level.
